roleset.name: worthy of loathing
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7.

example.name: both args
example.text: To those graduate students , it is not deplorable to become municipal administration workers , or to abandon their specialty studies . Rather , it is more dreadful not to squeeze into the system after working hard in their studies .
example.arg: to become municipal administration workers, or to abandon their specialty studies
